product_name: WTB Nineline TCS 29er Foldable Tire - 29 x 2.0
long_description: A lightweight race tire for 29ers, the WTB Nineline TCS 29er foldable mountain bike tire uses a square knob tread and supple casing to provide impressive traction and control during epic rides. Tubeless Compatible System (TCS) design (requires sealant, sold separately) features a supple 600 tpi casing with folding aramid bead. Tread design supplies versatile and confident handling on surfaces ranging from dry hardpack to muddy slop. Ramped center knobs roll fast while the terraced side knobs offer mud-shedding prowess. WTB Nineline TCS 29er Foldable Tire features a single durometer rubber.
short_description: A lightweight race tire for 29ers, the WTB Nineline TCS 29er foldable mountain bike tire uses a square knob tread and supple casing to provide impressive traction and control during epic rides.
